title: Education attainment
description: Number of people who have attained various educational milestones, e.g. completed high school or have a bachelor's degree

relatedChart.title: Education attainment rate
relatedChart.description: Percentage of the adult population who have attained various educational milestones, e.g. completed high school or have a bachelor's degree

title: School enrollment
description: Number of people who are enrolled in school, vs not enrolled in school

relatedChart.title: School enrollment rate
relatedChart.description: Percentage of people who are enrolled in school, vs not enrolled in school
